rows.label: fev11_140_150_msg0001
rows.name:
It's nice having more people around,
it's so much livelier. Plus, the fights
should be easier now.

rows.label: fev11_140_150_msg0002
rows.name:
Well, of course. I'm here, after all.
There's no way we'd struggle against
the monsters around here.

rows.label: fev11_140_150_msg0003
rows.name:
Your power is immense,
that's for sure, Heaven's Holy Grail.

rows.label: fev11_140_150_msg0004
rows.name: But that's not what Laura meant.

rows.label: fev11_140_150_msg0005
rows.name:
Laura doesn't think of it like,
"the Driver is the ally and
the Blade is just a tool," right?

rows.label: fev11_140_150_msg0007
rows.name:
When I said "more people around,"
I meant Adel and Hikari,
and Kasumi too.

rows.label: fev11_140_150_msg0008
rows.name:
It doesn't matter if you're a Driver
or a Blade. I was just happy that
we have more friends.

rows.label: fev11_140_150_msg0009
rows.name:
I see...
You're a strange one.

rows.label: fev11_140_150_msg0011
rows.name:
Everyone,
shall we depart for Yajika Harbor?

rows.label: fev11_140_150_msg0012
rows.name: The harbor is just up this road.

rows.label: fev11_140_150_msg0013
rows.name: The regular ferry from Yajika to Gula...

rows.label: fev11_140_150_msg0014
rows.name:
I haven't heard it's been cancelled yet.
Come on, let's hurry.
